en.today: Feelings intensify delightfully this morning, darling ram, as the Scorpio Moon aspects Jupiter and the nodes of fate. This cosmic climate lends the bravery and intuitive knowing that leads to commitment and reshapes paths. Release expectations from the past to acknowledge better alternatives that have presented themselves. Be generous with your love and nurturing to discover if another matches your emotions. The atmosphere thickens this evening when Luna squares Mercury, which could temper your confidence. Steer clear of obsessive behaviors and heated arguments, and consider how your perspective might evolve while allowing others to explain themselves.
